game.name: Last Term
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 신비로운 신에게 학교에 갇혔다. 주변을 기억하고, 이상 현상을 찾아내어 0층에 도달해 탈출하라.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’ve been trapped in a school by a mysterious God. Memorize your surroundings, spot the anomalies, and reach floor 0 to earn your escape.

reviewHighlights.text: fun anomaly game with some really good hidden ones and ofc some jumpscare ones :p defo one of the better anomaly games!
it was awesome! and defintely freaked the fuck out of me i dunno why its onsale when its already dirt cheap the game quality make it feel like a steal...
